subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Both teams struggled to produce scoring opportunities but Endy Chávez hit a game-winning single off Jason Grimsley in the 13th inning, boosting the Mets to a victory.
snippet: Both teams struggled to produce scoring opportunities but Endy Chávez hit a game-winning single off Jason Grimsley in the 13th inning, boosting the Mets to a victory.
